duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and coordinate the delivery of quality security services to an assigned customer.
Act as a liaison between customers, Operation Managers, and security officers.
Provide coaching, recognition, and discipline within an approved empowerment range.
Enforce Contract Standards and Allied Universal’s policies.
Administer site safety programs outlining site-specific hazards for security officers.
Participate in unemployment hearings and prepare relevant reports.
Work in various environments and handle crisis situations calmly and efficiently.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Licensing requirements may be subject to state and/or local laws and regulations)
